price: (Allāhu) Òun ni Ọlọ́hun tí wọ́n ń jọ́sìn fún ní ọ̀nà òdodo nínú sánmọ̀. Òun náà sì ni Ọlọ́hun tí wọ́n gbọ́dọ̀ jọ́sìn fún ní ọ̀nà òdodo lórí ilẹ̀. Òun ni Ọlọ́gbọ́n, Onímọ̀.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِلَٰهٞ وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَٰهٞۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī fī al-samāi ilāhun wafī al-arḍi ilāhun wahuwa al-ḥakīmu al-ʿalīmu
